title: Payment methods .....
body:
Hello ,I can't speak german very well, but   I need help ! I know this is silly but I need to buy Lux Elmentalist Edition without  letting my parents know because they will get mad and won't allow me pay for a game  , so I can't use paypal or mastercard or anything that has to do with banks , I can only use redeem cards like amazon gift cards and google play ones , I can't go to media market so I can't buy Riot'a RP cards , I can also use the mobile phone's netowork but it seems a bit more expensive and 20 Euros won't be enough .... in the normal methods like PayPal , 2800 RP + 450 RP bonus costs 20 Euros while using mobile network I can only get 2495 which means 20 Euros won't be enough to buy that Lux's pack , so is there any ways to pay like amazon or google play store ones ? 
[img]http://i.imgur.com/IHDAGTv.png[/img]

replies.body:
So first of all, this is actually the wrong board. We do have an english board as well.
But I assume you are currently living in germany right?

As already said, you could go and buy a Pasafecard if there's no store around with Riot Point Cards.
Just go to this link and check for availability in your area: https://www.paysafecard.com/en-gb/buy/find-sales-outlets/

Hope that's a possibility for you.
